text: Colin Parry (16 February 1941 – 13 August 2020) was an English professional footballer who played as a central defender. ==Career== Born in Stockport, Parry played for Vernon Park, Stockport County, Bradford City, Rochdale, Macclesfield Town and Morecambe. He was on loan at Bradford City from Stockport County between September and October 1965,Frost, p. 403 making 5 league appearances for the club.Frost, p. 387 He died on 13 August 2020. ==Sources== * ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Stockport County F.C. players Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:Rochdale A.F.C. players Category:Macclesfield Town F.C. players Category:Morecambe F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Association football defenders
title: Colin Parry (footballer)
